cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_NG_AMF to an invalid IP format '999.999.999.999' will cause network configuration errors and prevent AMF connection.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to 100 (exceeds maximum allowed power level) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent SSB transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為 100（超過最大允許功率水平）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止 SSB 傳輸。
